nodes.documentation: Returns the account balance of another account with address _owner.
nodes.name: balanceOf

nodes.documentation:
Transfers _value amount of tokens to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. 
The function SHOULD throw if the _from account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
nodes.name: transfer

nodes.documentation: Transfers _value amount of tokens from address _from to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event.
nodes.name: transferFrom

nodes.documentation:
Allows _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. 
If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value.
nodes.name: approve

nodes.documentation: Returns the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
nodes.name: allowance

nodes.documentation: MUST trigger when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers.
nodes.name: Transfer

nodes.documentation: MUST trigger on any successful call to approve(address _spender, uint256 _value).
nodes.name: Approval

nodes.documentation: Owned contract
nodes.name: Owned

nodes.documentation: Function to receive approval and execute function in one call.
nodes.name: TokenRecipient

nodes.documentation: Token implement
nodes.name: Token

nodes.documentation: Owner can transfer out any accidentally sent ERC20 tokens
nodes.name: transferAnyERC20Token

nodes.documentation: Approves and then calls the receiving contract
nodes.name: approveAndCall

nodes.documentation:
Destroy tokens.
Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly
nodes.name: burn

nodes.documentation:
Destroy tokens from other account.
Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.
nodes.name: burnFrom

nodes.documentation: Internal transfer, only can be called by this contract
nodes.name: _transfer

nodes.documentation: If ether is sent to this address, send it back.
